caption.p: 3C‐like proteinase–carfilzomib model. (A) Formula of (5s, 8s, 14r)‐ethyl 11‐(3‐amino‐3‐oxopropyl)‐8‐benzyl‐14‐hydroxy‐5‐isobutyl‐3, 6, 9, 12‐tetraoxo‐1‐phenyl‐2‐oxa‐4, 7, 10, 11‐tetraazapentadecan‐15‐oate (template ligand with ligand code AZP), carfilzomib, and lopinavir/ritonavir. (B) Overall structure of the model. (C) Close view of the carfilzomib binding site. Hydrogen bonds are shown in yellow lines.
